title: General Mills logo font
content:
I'm doing a fake cereal box design for school and I need to know the font used in the General Mills logotype. Attached is an image of the logo.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225214229im_/http:/typophile.com/files/general_mills_6571.jpg)
author: alderce0

comments.content: seems like you should be making a fake logo for your fake product instead of borrowing someone else's. however, if you just want to use the GM logo you can get it at [Seeklogo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225214229/http:/www.seeklogo.com/general-mills-logo-60044.html)
